data.text: Vinye, lé nye nyawo me ɖe asi
Lé nye sededewo me ɖe asi ekema ànɔ agbe
Bla wo ɖe wò asibidɛwo ŋu
Gblɔ na nunya be,
woana nyɔnu ahasitɔ la nanɔ adzɔge na wò,
Mele nye xɔ ƒe fesrẽ nu,
Mekpɔ ame aɖe le bebewuwo dome,
Ele zɔzɔm le kpɔdome,
le fiẽ me, esime anyigba nɔ tsyɔtsyɔm,
Tete nyɔnu aɖe do go va kpee,
Eƒe gbe le dzi dem,
ele kpɔdome fifia, kasia egado ɖe ablɔme xoxo
Elé ɖekakpui la hegbugbɔ nu nɛ ŋɔnɔe
“Ŋutifafavɔsa le aƒenye me,
eya ta medo be mava do go wò,
Meɖo aklala biɖibiɖi ƒe abadzivɔ si wode amadede vovovowoe,
Mewu lifi,
eya ta va, míano lɔlɔ̃ wòasu mí va se ɖe ŋdi,
Nye aƒetɔ mele aƒe o,
Etsɔ eƒe gakotoku si ga yɔ fũu la dzoe
Etsɔ amenublenya siawo blee
Etso zia enumake hekplɔe ɖo abe nyitsu
Va se ɖe esime aŋutrɔ naƒo ɖe eƒe aklã,
eya ta azɔ la, vinyewo,
Migana miaƒe dzi natrɔ ɖe eƒe mɔwo ŋu loo,
Elabena ame siwo tsi esi me la sɔ gbɔ,
Eƒe aƒe nye tsiẽƒe ƒe mɔ gbadza
